statements: UPDATE customers SET phone_number='123-456-7890', purchase_history='{"total_purchases": 5}' WHERE id=1
UPDATE customers SET email='newemail@example.com', name='John Doe' WHERE id=2
UPDATE customers SET name='John Doe', email='john.doe@example.com', phone_number='123-456-7890' WHERE id=1
UPDATE customers SET purchase_history='{"total_purchases": 10, "last_purchase_date": "2021-10-15"}' WHERE name='Alice Smith'
UPDATE Customer SET phone_number = '123-456-7890', name = 'John Doe' WHERE customer_id = 1;
UPDATE PurchaseHistory SET item_name = 'New Item', quantity = 5 WHERE customer_id = 2 AND purchase_date = '2022-09-15';
UPDATE Customer SET name = 'John Doe', email = 'johndoe@example.com' WHERE customer_id = 1;
UPDATE PurchaseHistory SET quantity = 5, price = 25.99 WHERE purchase_id = 100;
UPDATE Customers SET email_address = 'newemail@example.com' WHERE customer_id = 1
UPDATE Bicycles SET quantity_available = quantity_available - 1, bicycle_price = 899.99 WHERE bicycle_id = 101
UPDATE Customers SET email_address = 'new_email@example.com' WHERE customer_id = 123;
UPDATE Bicycles SET bicycle_price = 799.99, quantity_available = quantity_available - 1 WHERE bicycle_id = 456;
UPDATE customers SET email='updated_email@example.com' WHERE customer_id=1;
UPDATE bicycles SET price=1200.50, year=2022 WHERE bicycle_id=3;
UPDATE customers SET email='new_email@example.com', phone_number='123-456-7890' WHERE customer_id=1;
UPDATE bicycles SET year=2022, price=1500.00 WHERE brand='Trek' AND model='FX3';

UPDATE bikes SET price = 799.99, brand = 'NewBrand' WHERE bike_id = 3;
UPDATE customers SET first_name = 'John', last_name = 'Doe', email = 'johndoe@example.com' WHERE customer_id = 1;
